title: Marvel Superheroes Quiz
body: Match the colors to the correct Marvel superheroes by dragging and dropping.
instruction: Drag the correct color to each superhero. Some superheroes may have more than one correct color.
ariaRegion: This component is a drag and drop question about Marvel superheroes. Once you have matched the colors to the heroes, select the submit button below.

_feedback.correct: Great job! You know your Marvel superheroes well!

_incorrect.final: You've completed the quiz, but there were some mistakes. Review the correct answers to learn more about Marvel superheroes.
_incorrect.notFinal: Some of your answers are incorrect. Try again!
